song.title: Kusi
song.info:
The soundtrack to Orange's demo The Secret Life of Mr. Black from Assembly 1997. The actual module (kusi.it) is untitled and other markings only contain sample names.
Lyrics: My family. This is my family. My wife, my son, my daughter and I. I am Mrs. Black. My wife is Mr. Black. I am Mr. Black's husband. We have two children, a boy and a girl. The boy's name is John, he's twelve years old. The girl's name is Mary, she's still quite young. I am a woman, my wife is a man, he's twelve years old. (9x) I am daughter and I. My wife, two children, a boy and a girl. (2x)
